name: The Physik - a playbook for Wanderhome
name_original: The Physik - a playbook for Wanderhome
description:
The Phyik is a playbook for the fantastic Wanderhome tabletop role-playing game. Wanderhome is a story about exploration and healing.  The Physik studies illness and injury in a hope to, with effort, heal what ails those around them.

The Physik playbook is about playing an itinerant healer or barber-surgeon, traveling the Haeth, lessening pain, easing injury, while learning what makes pain -- and what makes well again.

Wanderhome is copyright of Possum Creek Games Inc.

The Physik Playbook  is an independent production by Andrew Aulenback and is not affiliated with Possum Creek Games Inc. It is published under the Wanderhome Third Party License.

Made possible by the generous Wanderhome Third Party License.
